turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: im sorry, they don't serve milkshakes at starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want hot chocolate with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want for your hot chocolate?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is grande ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered a grande hot chocolate with whipped cream to be picked up at westlake shopping center, daly city, ca is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I got the text from here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your hot chocolate.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. Have a nice day.
